title: Zip bomb
content:
Hi, if you go to this site https://blog.haschek.at/tools/bomb.php
from Tor Browser, the Tor browser hangs along with the system.
vuln_description: The vulnerability involves a zip bomb hosted on a specific website that causes the Tor Browser and the system to hang when accessed. This is a classic denial-of-service (DoS) attack leveraging a maliciously crafted zip file designed to consume excessive system resources.
reason: The attack is straightforward and does not involve multiple components, subtle interactions, or complex application states. The zip bomb is a well-known type of attack, and the steps to reproduce are simple and direct.
